ValidationRule.description: Check if Reason for contact, technical/customer issue, and customer struggle are populated when case is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name='New Standard Case', (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")), ISBLANK(TEXT( Customer_Issue__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT(Technical_Issue__c)), ISBLANK(Text(Customer_Struggle__c))) && OR( ISPICKVAL( Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Buy or Book"), ISPICKVAL( Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Change"), ISPICKVAL( Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Cancel or Refund"), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Reason_For_Contact__c ,"Disruption or Compensation"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure either of the Technical Issue or Customer Issue or Customer Struggle is selected .
